datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to digital currencies, blockchain technology, and decentralized finance.

columns.name: forum_participation_level
columns.description: The degree of participation the individual has in online forums discussing cryptocurrencies, rated from 1 to 5

columns.name: tech_workshops_attended
columns.description: Number of technology-focused workshops or webinars attended per year

columns.name: research_hours_per_week
columns.description: Average number of hours per week the individual spends researching cryptocurrency markets

columns.name: decentralized_finance_participation
columns.description: Whether the individual participates in decentralized finance platforms

columns.name: blockchain_conference_attendances
columns.description: The number of blockchain-related conferences the individual has attended in the past year

columns.name: trading_frequency_per_month
columns.description: The average number of times an individual makes crypto trades per month

columns.name: investment_in_crypto
columns.description: Amount of money invested in cryptocurrency

columns.name: holds_multiple_currencies
columns.description: Whether the individual holds more than one type of cryptocurrency

columns.name: digital_literacy_score
columns.description: Score assessing the individual's digital literacy, on a scale from 0 to 100

columns.name: follows_crypto_news
columns.description: Indicates whether the individual regularly follows news related to cryptocurrencies

columns.name: job_sector
columns.description: Sector of employment of the individual

columns.name: types_of_cryptocurrencies_invested
columns.description: The count of different types of cryptocurrencies the individual has invested in

columns.name: number_of_trading_platforms
columns.description: The count of different platforms on which the individual actively trades cryptocurrencies

columns.name: number_of_cryptocurrencies_owned
columns.description: The number of different cryptocurrencies owned by the individual

columns.name: online_course_enrollment_frequency
columns.description: Number of online courses related to digital skills enrolled in per year

columns.name: has_crypto_certifications
columns.description: Whether the individual has any formal certifications related to cryptocurrencies

columns.name: monthly_blockchain_transactions
columns.description: The average number of blockchain transactions made by the individual per month

columns.name: economic_condition
columns.description: Current economic condition expressed as normal, upturn, or downturn

columns.name: investment_experience_years
columns.description: The number of years the individual has been investing in cryptocurrencies

columns.name: uses_defi_services
columns.description: Whether the individual uses any decentralized financial services

columns.name: uses_blockchain_technology
columns.description: Whether the individual uses blockchain technology actively in other domains than cryptocurrency trading

columns.name: age
columns.description: Age of the individual participating in decentralized finance

columns.name: has_regular_access_to_internet
columns.description: Indicates whether the individual has regular access to the internet

queries.question: Is there a relationship between the number of cryptocurrencies owned by individuals and the frequency of blockchain conference attendances they participate in?
queries.true_hypothesis: Individuals who attend more blockchain-related conferences tend to own a certain number of cryptocurrencies and engage in a specific monthly average of blockchain transactions.
